China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 3 月 13 日星期三 16:13:00 GMT 120
Tesla slips as Wells Fargo warns of waning effect of price cuts over demandTesla shares dropped about 2% on Wednesday after Wells Fargo raised concerns over the waning impact of price cuts by the world's most valuable automaker on the demand for its electric vehicles and downgraded them to "underweight". Wed, 13 Mar 2024 14:46:30 GMT 54WHXPYINFMKNAVJYF4RMCDPM https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-slips-wells-fargo-warns-waning-effect-price-cuts-on-demand-2024-03-13/Reuters商业汽车与交通
McDonald's CFO says overseas sales to weaken more on Middle East, China hitMcDonald's international sales will fall sequentially in the current quarter, pressured by the conflict in the Middle East and demand weakness in China, CFO Ian Borden said on Wednesday, sending its shares down 2% in early trade. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 14:22:28 GMT OPK4ZZ4AYFKVJASZASOUEK34V4 https://www.reuters.com/business/mcdonalds-which-says-overseas-sales-weakened-more-middle-east-china-hit-2024-03-13/Reuters商业
US commission urges action on alleged North Korean labor in China fishingA U.S. congressional commission has called on the Biden administration to act against alleged forced labor involving North Korean workers in China's fishing industry, saying seafood sales to U.S. consumers could be helping finance North Korea's weapons programs. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 14:03:38 GMT E324WF5UJ5NLFALJXVAIYG62ZY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/us-commission-urges-action-alleged-north-korean-labor-china-fishing-2024-03-13/Reuters商业工作世界
Lopes volley takes 10-man Marinos into Asian Champions League semisTen-man Yokohama F Marinos booked their place in the semi-finals of the Asian Champions League on Wednesday as Anderson Lopes' volley earned Harry Kewell's side a 1-0 win over Shandong Taishan to complete a 3-1 aggregate victory. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 12:44:44 GMT XV3VKIL4E5LU5AY2XL7L37NMFE https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/lopes-volley-takes-10-man-marines-into-asian-champions-league-semis-2024-03-13/Michael Church运动的足球
China's defence ministry says it held military staff dialogue with NATOChina and NATO held an eighth military staff dialogue on security policy in Beijing on Wednesday, according to a statement from the Chinese defence ministry. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 12:06:42 GMT B6ETMQUXAVINPIBVHB26PXAMGU https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-defense-ministry-says-it-held-military-staff-dialogue-with-nato-2024-03-13/Reuters世界
US lawmakers to propose legislation seeking more scrutiny of Chinese real estate purchasesTwo U.S. lawmakers are set to introduce legislation on Thursday to significantly expand government foreign investment reviews of real estate purchases by buyers from China and other foreign countries posing national security concerns. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 11:37:37 GMT SXAYFJUO3BMA3C6U4NVEMBXKNA https://www.reuters.com/markets/us-lawmakers-propose-legislation-seeking-more-scrutiny-chinese-real-estate-2024-03-13/David Shepardson市场
